nodes.title: Regret in the Morning
nodes.story: You wake up with a pounding headache and a sinking feeling. You check your phone. Sent: 'I've been in love with you for years. Please don't hate me.' To: Your crush. Delivered: 3:47 AM.

nodes.title: The Reply
nodes.story: Three dots appear. Disappear. Reappear. Finally: 'We need to talk. Meet me at the usual coffee place in an hour.'

nodes.title: The Conversation
nodes.story: They're already there, two coffees waiting. 'So... drunk you had some things to say.' They smile nervously. 'Sober you want to elaborate?'

nodes.title: Revelation
nodes.story: They reach across the table and take your hand. 'I've felt the same way. For years. I was just too scared to say it.'

choices.text: Kiss them right there in the cafe
Ask if they want to try dating
Panic and say you need time to think

nodes.title: New Beginning
nodes.story: The first date turns into a relationship. Your drunk confession becomes your 'how we got together' story. Sometimes truth comes out sideways.

nodes.title: The Distance
nodes.story: They look hurt. 'Sure. We can pretend.' But things are never the same. The friendship fades into awkward texts and cancelled plans.
